scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.node: cd ../build && npm start && cd ../test && tap --no-esm --no-coverage -r source-map-support/register -R spec ./unit/tests/**/*-*.js && node ./unit/size.js ../.dist/ngn/index.js ../.dist/ngn-debug/index.min.js.map
scripts.x: cd ../build && npm start && cd ../test && node -r source-map-support/register ./unit/tests/**/*-*.js
scripts.browser: npm run build:test:browser && node ./unit/prepareKarmaBrowserSuite.js && BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=../build/.browserslistrc BROWSERSLIST_ENV=current karma start ./unit/karma.conf.cjs
scripts.browser:manual: npm run clean && npm run build:test:browser && node ./unit/prepareKarmaBrowserSuite.js && node ./unit/prepareManualTestEnvironment.js && cd .testsuite
scripts.browser:manual:create: npm run browser:manual && cd .testsuite && fenix create
scripts.browser:manual:open: npm run browser:manual && cd .testsuite && fenix open
scripts.compat: echo 'Building...' && cd ../build && npm run browser && echo 'Testing modern browser compatibility...' && cd ../test && BROWSERSLIST_ENV=current BROWSERSLIST_CONFIG=../build/.browserslistrc eslint -c ./.eslintrc ../.dist/browser/browser-*/*.min.js --no-ignore && echo Done.
